about_the_game:
Additional NSFW content for NSFW Solitaire. Mostly AI-generated.

Note: it will only show in the game if you've allowed AI-generated content. Options->Graphics->Allow AI-generated content.

41 NSFW card sets:
- hentai
- digital art
- photorealistic
- slime girls
- some HD clothed girls
After installing the DLC you should see these card sets in the Options -> Graphics -> Card set.

399 images used in the puzzles section:
- hentai
- digital art
- photorealistic
After installing the DLC you should see them as backgrounds in the Options -> Graphics -> Background.

content_descriptors.notes: Drawn and AI-generated nudity, scenes of sex, explicit depiction of genitalia.
